# Documentation index

This folder centralizes repository documentation for easier maintenance.

Included:

- `README.md` — primary project overview
- `DESIGN_PRD.md` — product requirements document
- `UI_SPEC.md` — UI specification and guidelines
- `ARCHITECTURE.md` — high-level architecture notes
- `ROADMAP.md` — project roadmap and phases

If you modify documents in the root, please also update the copies here.
